title: MoveConstantTerm
description: Amy likes to move constant terms from one side of an equation to the other. She in the future steps then can combine them to simplify the equation.

header: Cancel opposite terms on opposite sides
title: CancelOppTermsOppSides
description: Amy could have mistakenly canceled opposite terms even when they were not on the same side.

title: MoveNegativeSignAdding
description: While adding one positive and one negative number, Amy could have correctly used the subtraction method but mistakenly ignored the fact that the negative number is larger.

header: Multiply both sides to reduce fractions
title: MultiplyBothSidesReduceFractions
description: To find the value of x on its own, as opposed to some fraction of x, Amy multiplies an integer to both sides of the equation when the coefficient of x is a fraction.
